segments.text: Welcome to Lincoln Bank . Which service do you require today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm here to ask about a loan .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We have many loans on offer . May I ask what the purpose of the loan is ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I got married not long ago and we are expecting our first child . I'd like to buy a car for the family .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . What you need is one of our Petty Consumer Loans .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Could you tell me what the requirements are for that , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Certainly . It's quite simple really . Do you hold a resident's permit ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I do . I was born and bred here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's great . We'll also need details of your occupation .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have all of that with me . I've also banked here for a number of years .
segments.speaker: S2
